topComments.author: Holly Sargeant
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Se eu pudesse dar a este lugar mais de 5 estrelas, eu daria! Eu sou um local e sempre quis visitar este lugar. Hoje finalmente consegui, tirei um dia solo de sa√∫de mental. O parque √© limpo, n√£o muito ocupado, eles t√™m tantos animais bonitos para ver e aprender, e a equipe √© muito gentil e prestativa. Eu esque√ßo o nome dela, mas a mulher com a m√°scara de leopardo na recep√ß√£o me ajudou a planejar meu dia e foi muito paciente, ela explicou todas as minhas op√ß√µes e n√£o me apressou. Eu adicionei os encontros de pregui√ßa e l√™mure, que tinham pre√ßos razo√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãpara a experi√™ncia. Morgin hospedado tanto e ela foi FABULOSA! Super amig√°vel, experiente e gentilmente informativo sobre o que poder√≠amos / n√£o poder√≠amos fazer durante nosso tempo com os animais. Ela √© uma j√≥ia! Eu definitivamente voltarei com a fam√≠lia quando eles estiverem na cidade. Corri para o Safari para alimentar a girafa Walter antes de chover, ent√£o fui embora. N√£o consegui fazer o passeio pelo saf√°ri (minha decis√£o pessoal porque estava prestes a chover e meu carro n√£o tem ar condicionado, ent√£o seria uma trilha quente para eu passar, janelas abertas). Enfim, foi um dia memor√°vel e com certeza voltarei!  (Original) If I could give this place more than 5 stars, I would! I am a local & have always wanted to visit this place. Today I finally did, I took a solo, mental health day. The park is clean, not crazy busy, they have so many beautiful animals to see & learn about, and the staff is so kind & helpful. I forget her name, but the woman in the leopard mask at the front desk helped me plan my day & was very patient, she explained all my options & didn‚Äôt rush me. I added on the sloth & lemur encounters, which were reasonably priced for the experience. Morgin hosted both and she was FABULOUS! Super friendly, knowledgeable, & kindly informative on what we could/couldn‚Äôt do during our time with the animals. She‚Äôs a gem! I‚Äôll definitely be back with family when they‚Äôre in town. I did run over to the Safari  to feed Walter the giraffe before it rained, then I left. Didn‚Äôt get to do the drive through safari (my personal decision because it was about to rain & my car has no AC, so that would‚Äôve been a hot trail for me to go through, windows up). All in all, it was a memorable day & I will for sure be back!

topComments.author: Mike Abreu
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) 5 estrelas n√£o s√£o suficientes para esta experi√™ncia fant√°stica! N√≥s dois ficamos impressionados al√©m de nossas expectativas. Os animais s√£o t√£o saud√°veis, en√©rgicos e bonitos. Muitos estavam brincando e perseguindo uns aos outros. O lugar √© impec√°vel. Obviamente, muito bem cuidado. Honestamente, faz o reino animal parecer ruim. Qualquer pessoa que visite a Fl√≥rida Central realmente deve ir. No topo do safari (que por si s√≥ vale o pre√ßo razo√°vel) voc√™ tem acesso ao parque gatorland, que tem exposi√ß√µes incr√≠veis e apresenta√ß√µes de perto. Ficamos muito felizes depois dessa experi√™ncia. Voc√™ n√£o vai se decepcionar!  (Original) 5 stars isn‚Äôt enough for this fantastic experience! We both were impressed beyond our expectations. The animals are so healthy looking, energetic and beautiful. Many were playing and chasing one another. The place is spotless. Obviously very well cared for. Honestly makes animal kingdom look bad.  Anyone visiting Central Florida really must go. On top of the safari (which itself is worth the reasonable price) you get access to the gatorland park which has amazing exhibits and close up presentations. We were so happy after this experience. You will not be disappointed!

topComments.author: A Mohrmann
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos um momento maravilhoso! Levamos as crian√ßas a v√°rios zool√≥gicos em todo o pa√≠s ao longo dos anos. Mas depois de descobrir que o Animal Kingdom estava esgotado alguns fins de semana atr√°s, encontramos este lugar ao procurar uma aventura de saf√°ri online. Ver os rostos das crian√ßas iluminados de emo√ß√£o foi a melhor parte. Fomos em um dia de semana por volta das 16h e √©ramos o √∫nico carro que passava no momento. Por isso, foi bom levar o nosso tempo dirigindo lentamente e aproveitando ao m√°ximo a experi√™ncia. Apenas negativos foram a garota na bilheteria e as senhoras na √°rea de alimenta√ß√£o de girafas n√£o foram muito amig√°veis. Mas uma vez que terminamos com eles, os animais compensaram a falta de atendimento ao cliente. Recomendo!  (Original) We had a wonderful time! We‚Äôve taken the kids to several zoos across the nation over the years. But after finding out Animal Kingdom was sold out a couple weekends ago, we found this place when searching for a safari adventure online. Seeing the kids‚Äô faces lit up with excitement was the best part. We went on a weekday around 4PM and were the only car driving through at the time. So it was nice to take our time driving slowly through and getting the most out of the experience. Only negatives were  the girl at the ticket booth and ladies at the giraffe feeding area were not very friendly. But once we got done with them, the animals made up for their lack luster customer service. Would highly recommend!

topComments.author: Denise Byrne

The staff are extremely knowledgeable, and take lots of time to talk to you. The animals are very well taken care of and their habitats are clean. Drive through safari was amazing, and don't miss the giraffe encounter or Crusher show!

topComments.author: Hannah Long
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque jacar√© √© uma j√≥ia escondida! Viemos aqui para um saf√°ri h√° um ano e pulamos o parque de jacar√©s. A nova expans√£o do saf√°ri tornou ainda mais emocionante com as zebras andando por toda parte. A alimenta√ß√£o da girafa no final do saf√°ri vale absolutamente os US$ 5 por pessoa. (Original) The gator park is such a hidden gem! We came here for a safari a year ago and skipped the gator park. We went to the gator park this year after the safari and were blown away. The safari itself is always fun for the kids. The new exansion to the safari made it even more exciting with the zebras walking around everywhere. The giraffe feeding at the end of the safari is absolutely worth the $5 per person. We may not do the safari every time we come, but the gator park for the bird feeding, gator feeding, and even the playground is definitely worth it!

topComments.author: Kaitlyn Rose
topComments.comment: This place was so amazing! Such an incredible experience watching animals from your own vehicle having the ability to look at the animals close up at your own pace! Checking out the Zoo down the road after the Safari is a MUST DO!  Such a beautiful place

Atmosfera muito relaxante e pre√ßos razo√°veis. Eu recomendo altamente!  (Original) My family and I just went today and we had a blast! topComments.author: Roads Traveled Photography
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Sem d√∫vida, eles fizeram um trabalho fant√°stico em tornar este parque. Mas canhoto, mesmo com a taxa de residente da Fl√≥rida, √© CARO !!! Voc√™ paga a entrada, por pessoa, $$$, mais extra se quiser alimentar os jacar√©s, extra para alimentar as girafas, extra para os passeios de aerobarco $$$, mais se quiser almo√ßar com uma bebida gelada e n√£o n√£o se esque√ßa da loja de presentes porque as crian√ßas com certeza n√£o v√£o. Pelo dinheiro que voc√™ gasta com uma fam√≠lia, vale a pena dirigir at√© o Lion Country Safari. topComments.author: Steve Malcolm

Sugiro se preparar para o pior trazendo lanches e atividades/jogos de viagem, apenas no caso.  (Original) We had a great day out at the Airboats, Gator Park, finishing up with the Safari. I think it's a great experience for the area, though overwhelmingly fun for older kids. There are plenty of animals and you generally see them up close. Pros: you can take your time, stop and just enjoy the nature taking place in front of you. Cons: You can get stuck in a bit of a tailback of slow moving cars, which can be frustrating if there are notucj animals in that area. I suggest preparing for the worst by bringing snacks and road trip activities/games just-in-case.

topComments.author: aila bello
topComments.comment: We had such an amazing time at wild florida. Well worth the price and the almost 2 hour drive from Tampa to see such beauty in nature. We went around twice for the drive thru safari and so glad we did. As the weather changes and the heat starts to break up a little the animals we missed originally were out in full affect. If you get the chance to go I would do so.

topComments.author: Baidyanath Panda
topComments.comment: Superb experience. They have so many animals. You can experience nature with animals walking near you. My Kid went crazy seeing so many animals next to him. Zebras and all just next to the car. What an amazing experience. Thank you guys for maintaining such a wonderful place. Worth visiting this place.
